name: John Smith
shortBio: John Smith is a classically trained chef with a passion for creating unique and delicious dishes. He has worked in some of the top restaurants in the country and has gained a reputation for his innovative approach to cooking. In his spare time, John enjoys experimenting with new ingredients and techniques to create unforgettable culinary experiences for his guests.

recipes.title: Three-Cheese Mac and Cheese
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Cook the macaroni according to the package instructions.
2. In a separate saucepan, melt the cheddar, gruyere, and parmesan cheeses with the milk over low heat.
3. Add the cooked macaroni to the cheese sauce and stir to combine.

recipes.title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat the grill to high heat.
2. Brush the steak with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
3. Grill the steak for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.
4. Let the steak rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
5. Optional: add minced garlic to the steak during the last minute of grilling for extra flavor.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F.
2. Cream the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar in a mixing bowl.
3. Add the flour and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the chocolate chips.
5. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
